about_me_text: Software developer with over 8 years of experience, specializing in backend with .NET and C#. I have worked in Agile environments, building scalable and optimized solutions, with a strong foundation in software architecture and databases. Throughout my career, I have worked both in large consulting firms and small tech companies, participating in projects of various complexity and scope. I am passionate about technological challenges and continuous improvement, always seeking to add value both technically and organizationally to ambitious and innovative projects.
